org.apache.hadoop.util

类 MachineList

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.util.MachineList

  • public class MachineList
extends Object
    Container class which holds a list of ip/host addresses and answers membership queries. Accepts list of ip addresses, ip addreses in CIDR format and/or host addresses.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MachineList.InetAddressFactory
      InetAddressFactory is used to obtain InetAddress from host.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static org.apache.commons.logging.Log LOG 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MachineList(Collection<String> hostEntries) 
      MachineList(Collection<String> hostEntries, MachineList.InetAddressFactory addressFactory)
      Accepts a collection of ip/cidr/host addresses
      MachineList(String hostEntries) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Collection<String> getCollection()
      returns the contents of the MachineList as a Collection This can be used for testing
      boolean includes(String ipAddress)
      Accepts an ip address and return true if ipAddress is in the list

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MachineList

        public MachineList(String hostEntries)
        参数:
        hostEntries - comma separated ip/cidr/host addresses

      • MachineList

        public MachineList(Collection<String> hostEntries)
        参数:
        hostEntries - collection of separated ip/cidr/host addresses

      • MachineList

        public MachineList(Collection<String> hostEntries,
           MachineList.InetAddressFactory addressFactory)
        Accepts a collection of ip/cidr/host addresses
        参数:
        hostEntries -
        addressFactory - addressFactory to convert host to InetAddress

    • 方法详细资料

      • includes

        public boolean includes(String ipAddress)
        Accepts an ip address and return true if ipAddress is in the list
        参数:
        ipAddress -
        返回:
        true if ipAddress is part of the list

      • getCollection

        public Collection<String> getCollection()
        returns the contents of the MachineList as a Collection This can be used for testing
        返回:
        contents of the MachineList
